scripts.start:dev: npm run clean && npm run db-migrate-down-test && npm run db-migrate-up && nodemon ./src/index.ts
scripts.deploy: npm install && npm run setenv && npm run printenv && npm run build && eb use Mystoreapi-env && eb deploy
scripts.test: set ENV=test&& db-migrate down --count 4 -e test && db-migrate up -e test && npm run build && npx jasmine && db-migrate down --count 4 -e test
scripts.setenv: eb setenv ENV=$ENV PORT=$PORT POSTGRES_DB=$POSTGRES_DB POSTGRES_DB_TEST=$POSTGRES_DB_TEST POSTGRES_HOST=$POSTGRES_HOST POSTGRES_USERNAME=$POSTGRES_USERNAME POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$POSTGRES_PASSWORD SALT=$SALT SECRET_JWT_TOKEN_KEY=$SECRET_JWT_TOKEN_KEY
